sentences.sContent: They emit high frequency pulses of sound through their mouth or nose which bounce off surfaces and objects around them.
sentences.sContent_eng: They emit high frequency pulses of sound through their mouth or nose which bounce off surfaces and objects around them.
sentences.sCn: 它们通过嘴或鼻子发出高频脉冲声，这些脉冲声碰到周围的表面或物体就会反射回来。
